attributes.action: not  integrate Britain any further with the E E C without a referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like Mr Blair to stop adopting any further E E C law without first calling a referendum  and only UK citizens allowed to vote on this referendum

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ReferendumNOW/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
